mods.tableOfContents: v.1. The deerslayer. The pathfinder. The pioneers.- v.2. The last of the Mohicans. The prairie. The spy.- v.3. The pilot. The Red Rover. The two admirals.- v.4. The sea lions. Afloat and ashore. The water witch.- v.5. The crater. Miles Wallingford. Homeward bound.- v.6. Home as found. The chainbearers. The redskins.- v.7. Wyandotte. The monikins. Jack Tier.- v.8. Oak openings. Satanstoe. Mercedes of Castile.- v.9. The ways of the hour. Wing and wing. The Wept of the wish-ton-wish. Precaution.- v.10. The headsman. Lionel Lincoln. The bravo. Heidenmauer.
